name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a hearty meat and tomato sauce.
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Stir in tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, and pepper. Let it simmer for 30 minutes. Serve with spaghetti.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy American-style pancakes, perfect for breakfast.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter. Pour batter onto a hot pan and cook until golden brown on both sides.

name: Vegetable Curry
description: A flavorful curry with fresh vegetables and coconut milk.
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in oil. Add curry paste and cook briefly. Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry. Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes. Serve with rice.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh salad with crispy croutons and creamy dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce. Toast croutons in a pan. Prepare dressing with mayonnaise, garlic, lemon juice, mustard, and Parmesan. Mix everything together and top with Parmesan.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt. Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Stir until smooth. Pour into a greased baking pan and bake at 180°C (350°F) for about 35 minutes.
